availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Peters (Campbell County, Kentucky, brick mason)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, brick mason. Virginia native. Married to Mary A. Peters. Father of Anna E. Peters, Mary J. Peters, Charles Peters, Peter Peters, Millard Peters, Catherine Peters, and James Peters. Brick mason in Campbell County in 1850. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 148. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Jamestown District, p. 35. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Dayton, p. 10.
